name: mofo-ui
description: React component library for Mozilla Foundation

scripts.build:demo: shx mkdir -p demo/js && shx mkdir -p demo/css && shx cp dist/mofo-ui.css demo/css/ && shx cp dist/mofo-ui.js demo/js/ && shx cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css demo/css/ && shx cp node_modules/mofo-bootstrap/dest/css/mofo-bootstrap.css demo/css/
scripts.build:scss: node-sass src/main.scss dist/mofo-ui.css && node-sass src/demo/demo.scss demo/css/demo.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:scss && npm run build:autoprefix && npm run build:demo
scripts.start: npm i && npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel server watch
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run lint-sass
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git pull origin master
scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin --tags

author: Mozilla
